#configure submodule cpp-netlib
set(CPP-NETLIB_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE EXTERNAL "")
set(CPP-NETLIB_BUILD_EXPERIMENTS OFF CACHE EXTERNAL "")
set(CPP-NETLIB_BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE EXTERNAL "")
set(CPP-NETLIB_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE EXTERNAL "")
set(CPP-NETLIB_ENABLE_HTTPS ON CACHE EXTERNAL "")
#build submodule cpp-netlib
add_subdirectory(cpp-netlib)
